languages.text: The user immediately doubles their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and reduces the costs of their non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} by −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (to a minimum of 0) until the end of their turn. After the effect ends, the user suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round.
languages.original_text: Число {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} персонажа немедленно удваивается, а расход {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} на неатакующие {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} сокращается на −2 (может опуститься до 0) до конца его хода. После прекращения действия эффекта на 1 раунд персонаж становится {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлен{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлен{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The user immediately doubles their MP and reduces the costs of their non-attack abilities by −2 AP (to a minimum of 0) until the end of their turn. After the effect ends, the user suffers slowed and staggered for 1 round.

The user immediately doubles their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and reduces the costs of their non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} by −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (to a minimum of 0) until the end of their turn. After the effect ends, the user suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round.

После прекращения действия эффекта на 1 раунд персонаж становится {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлен{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлен{/g}.
languages.original_text: The user immediately doubles their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and reduces the costs of their non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} by −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (to a minimum of 0) until the end of their turn. After the effect ends, the user suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Число ОП персонажа немедленно удваивается, а расход ОД на неатакующие способности сокращается на −2 (может опуститься до 0) до конца его хода. После прекращения действия эффекта на 1 раунд персонаж становится замедлен и ошеломлен.

Число ОП персонажа немедленно удваивается, а расход ОД на неатакующие способности сокращается на −2 (может опуститься до 0) до конца его хода. После прекращения действия эффекта на 1 раунд персонаж становится замедлен и ошеломлен.

languages.text: 使用者的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}翻倍，所有非攻击性{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}技能{/g}耗费的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低2点（最低降至0点），效果持续至{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果结束后，使用者会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: The user immediately doubles their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and reduces the costs of their non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} by −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (to a minimum of 0) until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. After the effect ends, the user suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}翻倍，所有非攻击性{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}技能{/g}耗费的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低2点（最低降至0点），效果持续至{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}结束后，使用者会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: 直ちに{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が2倍になり、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで攻撃以外の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}消費が2減少（最小0）効果終了後、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}が付与される。
languages.original_text: The user immediately doubles their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and reduces the costs of their non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} by −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (to a minimum of 0) until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. After the effect ends, the user suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 直ちに{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が2倍になり、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで攻撃以外の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}消費が2減少（最小0）{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}終了後、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}が付与される。

languages.text: El usuario duplica sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} al instante y reduce el coste de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} no ofensivas en −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} (hasta un mínimo de 0) hasta que finalice su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Al terminar el efecto, el usuario sufre los efectos {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}.
languages.original_text: The user immediately doubles their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and reduces the costs of their non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} by −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (to a minimum of 0) until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. After the effect ends, the user suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El usuario duplica sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} al instante y reduce el coste de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} no ofensivas en −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} (hasta un mínimo de 0) hasta que finalice su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Al terminar el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g}, el usuario sufre los efectos {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}.

languages.text: Der Nutzer verdoppelt seine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} augenblicklich und reduziert die Kosten seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Nichtangriffs-Fähigkeiten{/g} um −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (bis zu minimal 0), und zwar bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g}. Nachdem der Effekt ausläuft, erleidet der Nutzer {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g} für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.
languages.original_text: The user immediately doubles their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and reduces the costs of their non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} by −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (to a minimum of 0) until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. After the effect ends, the user suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Nutzer verdoppelt seine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} augenblicklich und reduziert die Kosten seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Nichtangriffs-Fähigkeiten{/g} um −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (bis zu minimal 0), und zwar bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g}. Nachdem der {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} ausläuft, erleidet der Nutzer {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g} für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.

languages.text: L'utilisateur double immédiatement ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et réduit le coût de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} non offensives de −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} (minimum 0) jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Une fois cet effet dissipé, il subit les effets {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: The user immediately doubles their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and reduces the costs of their non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} by −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (to a minimum of 0) until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. After the effect ends, the user suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur double immédiatement ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et réduit le coût de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} non offensives de -2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} (minimum 0) jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Une fois cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} dissipé, il subit les effets {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
